about.title: Who we are
about.paragraph1: Founded in 2025 by a dynamic collective of software engineers, IT specialists, and business strategists, Apollo Automation empowers small and mid‑sized organisations to unlock efficiency through bespoke AI, no‑code, and low‑code solutions.
about.paragraph2: Our early successes in the investment sector taught us that streamlined processes free teams to focus on growth. Today, we guide companies across industries to achieve operational excellence and sustainable growth.

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.subtitle: Common questions about AI automation and our implementation process.

needAi.question: Do I need AI automation?
needAi.answer: If repetitive tasks slow you down or you're drowning in data, automation can free your team to focus on strategy. During our discovery phase, we identify where automation adds the most value.

timeline.question: How long does implementation take?
timeline.answer: Timelines vary by scope, but small pilots can launch in 4–6 weeks. Larger roll‑outs follow our phased process, delivering incremental value along the way.

security.question: How do you ensure data security?
security.answer: We adhere to industry‑standard encryption, role‑based access controls, and rigorous testing. Your data never leaves secure, compliant environments.

roi.question: What ROI can I expect?
roi.answer: Many clients see payback in under six months through reduced labour costs, faster turnaround times, and improved accuracy. We set measurable KPIs during roadmapping to track impact.
